title: Evolution
description: An introduction to evolutionary patterns and processes, including the history of life, phylogenetics, population genetics, quantitative genetics, molecular evolution, and other important topics in evolutionary biology.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:

prerequisites: BIOL 2335 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOL 2344 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOL 2345 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
